description: A Spanish Trumpet stop of strong (fuerte) tone. Grove gives it flared tin resonators.
examplesDescription: Clarin Fuerte 8', Second Manual, left hand; Toledo Cathedral, Toledo, Spain; Valentin and Jose Verdalonga 1798.
